articles.description: The former MP was back fronting the ITV news programme after a few days absence
articles.content: Ed Balls was forced to issue an apology as he made a 'bad' mistake on Good Morning Britain. The former MP was back fronting the ITV news programme on Wednesday (February 8) after a few days absence. … [+3333 chars]
